TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit JsonMarshal extends System.Object
public ref class JsonMarshal abstract sealed

Docs.summary: An unsafe class that provides a set of methods to access the underlying data representations of JSON types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> GetRawUtf8PropertyName(valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonProperty property) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetRawUtf8PropertyName (property As JsonProperty) As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)

Docs.param: The JSON property from which to extract the span.
Docs.summary: Gets a view over the raw JSON data of the given name.
Docs.returns: The span containing the raw JSON data of the name. This will not include the enclosing quotes.
Docs.remarks: While the method itself does check for disposal of the underlying , it is possible that it could be disposed after the method returns, which would result in the span pointing to a buffer that has been returned to the shared pool. Callers should take extra care to make sure that such a scenario isn't possible to avoid potential data corruption.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> GetRawUtf8Value(valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonElement element) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetRawUtf8Value (element As JsonElement) As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)

Docs.param: The JSON element from which to extract the span.
Docs.summary: Gets a view over the raw JSON data of the given .
Docs.returns: The span containing the raw JSON data of.

remarks.para: While the method itself does check for disposal of the underlying , it is possible that it could be disposed after the method returns, which would result in the span pointing to a buffer that has been returned to the shared pool. Callers should take extra care to make sure that such a scenario isn't possible to avoid potential data corruption.
